name: @nodes-links/util-aws-apigateway-helpers-sdk-libs
description: Utility for the Nodes & Links sdk

scripts.pull-origin: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/nodes-links/util-aws-apigateway-helpers-sdk-libs.git && git fetch && git checkout -f master && git pull
scripts.build-and-publish: npm run prepare-out && npm run copy-package-json && cd .\out && npm run pull-origin && cd .. && npm run build && npm run publish
scripts.push-origin: npm run build-and-publish && cd .\out && git add . && git commit -m 'Add new version' && git push
